alice.respect.core

Class TimedContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • alice.respect.core.RootInterface
      • alice.respect.core.TimedContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITimedContext

    public class TimedContext
extends RootInterface
implements ITimedContext
    A Timed Context wraps the access to a tuple centre virtual machine for a specific thread of control, providing a timed interface.
    Author:
    aricci
